Description.Name: Main Med Bay
Description.Details: The medical facilities on the Argo are fantastic, sir! There are six beds to treat injured MechWarriors. However, there is a lot of room for improvement, as the rest of the medical facilities have sustained major damage during the initial crash of the Argo. We will have to invest a lot of C-Bills to get this facility to its original state. In addition, there will be an added monthly cost that includes medical supplies and MedTech salaries for 2 MedTechs
